projects.title: TaskTide AI
projects.description: An AI-powered study scheduler for students. It uses AI to help students manage their time and study schedule.

projects.title: Chess Game + Algorithm
projects.description: A chess game that allows player vs player and player vs computer. The computer uses the minimax algorithm along with alpha-beta pruning to find the best move.

projects.title: EcoReceipts
projects.description: A web app created during the SproutHacks 2025 hackathon that allows users to scan their receipts and get a report on the items they bought.

projects.title: Face Recognition App
projects.description: A face recognition app that uses the face_recognition library to detect faces and identify them. Users can add their faces to the database and then the app will identify them when they are in the camera feed.

projects.title: Replica Of Tetris
projects.description: A replica of the classic game Tetris. It is a program in html css and javascript.

projects.title: Snake AI Agent
projects.description: A python program that uses reinforcement learning to train an AI agent to play the game snake.

paragraphs: Hi! I'm Dhairya Shah, a high school student, developer, and problem-solver with a passion for building innovative digital solutions. Ever since I started coding, I've been fascinated by how technology can streamline everyday tasks and create meaningful change.

I specialize in full-stack development, with a focus on creating scalable and efficient solutions. I'm also experienced in machine learning and AI, and I'm always looking for new ways to use technology to solve problems.

Beyond coding, I'm actively involved in math competitions, DECA, STEM and chess, always looking for ways to challenge myself and grow. I also enjoy working out, playing the guitar, and exploring new technologies.
I'm always open to collaborating on exciting projects or learning opportunitiesâ€”feel free to reach out!

collaborations.title: TaskTide AI
description: AI-powered scheduling application for personalized, adaptive study plans tailored towards students
Integrated Google Calendar, working on integrating other task management platforms
Designed an AI chatbot for task automation and study assistance
Currently in testing phase with plans for wider release

collaborations.title: Toyota Projects
description: Assisted in writing software code and developing solutions for internal projects (some of it outsourced to me)
Gained hands-on experience in a professional technology environment
Learned about industry standards and professional development workflows

volunteering.title: Cameron Heights Collegiate Institute
description: Helped run various school events and activities
Eg: I assisted with Connect With Cameron in 2024

volunteering.title: Canada Day Event (2024)
description: Checked one of the gates to ensure only authorized members entered
Sold tickets for a lucky draw fundraiser
Assisted with event organization and crowd management

volunteering.title: Middle School STEM Support
description: Provided advice and mentorship to younger students
Helped the STEM club with Arduino programming and projects
Provided assistance to teachers for technical activities

education.institution: Cameron Heights Collegiate Institute. This semester: Math, Science, English, Guitar

hero.title: Dhairya Shah
hero.subtitle: HS Student & Developer
hero.description: I'm passionate about building innovative digital experiences that are fast, intuitive, and accessible. With a strong foundation in software development, I specialize in creating web and mobile applications that solve real-world problems. Currently, I'm exploring AI-driven solutions, full-stack development, and efficient system design.
